description: 99 Balls 3D is a fun, fast-paced arcade puzzle game where every shot counts! Aim, shoot, and break as many numbered blocks as you can before they reach the bottom. Perfect your angle, master the bounce, and survive wave after wave to beat your high score!
name: 99Balls
